data.title: Pentair SuperFlo VS 1.5HP Variable Speed Pool Pump | EC-342001
data.meta_description: Pentair SuperFlo VS - Variable Speed 1.5 HP Pool Pump (342001). ePoolSupply is a preferred certified Pentair Reseller. Shop online now!
data.text:
Pentair SuperFlo VS Variable Speed Pool Pump (EC-342001)

The Energy Star Certified 1.5 HP Pentair SuperFlo VS Variable Speed Pump brings the remarkable energy and cost savings of variable speed technology to standard pools at an affordable price. The Pentair Superflo VS reduces energy costs by up to 80%. SuperFlo VS Variable Speed Pumps have an easy-to-read graphical display and a built-in timer. These pool pumps are easy to install and easy to use.

1.5 HP Pool Pump: Perfect for Everyday Swimming Pools

Variable speed technology costs significantly less to operate

Ideal for standard pools requiring up to a 2.2 hp pump(uprated).

110/230V and 50/60 Hz capability - with automatic recognition

Real-time clock with 24-hour memory retention

Simple, yet intuitive, the user interface is easy to program and operate

Easy to access electrical connections for simple installation

Three operating speed settings plus override capability

SuperFlo Pump by Pentair Aquatic Systems is a direct replacement for the Hayward® Super Pump®

WEF(Software Rev) 9.0 THP(Total Horsepower) 2.2

This product qualifies for the Pentair eCommerce Warranty

Energy Star Certified

The Pentair SuperFlo VS will seamlessly replace all existing SuperFlo single-speed and variable-speed pumps without any plumbing required. Just simply unscrew the existing unions and then simply just re-install. If you have an existing SuperFlo Pool Pump, the only tools you will need are 1 - flat head screwdriver and 1 - Philips screwdriver.

PRODUCT COMPONENTS

Built-in, real-time, 24-hour clock

Intuitive, easy-to-use interface

The display shows watt use and other key operational information

The wiring compartment is easy to access

ePoolSupply Tips

This variable-speed pool pump is recommended for pools that have suction cleaners or a dedicated booster pump for pressure cleaners.

The extremely low-cost running motor enables the pump drive to run longer, and quieter, and saves you money!

3 programmable speeds to ramp up when you need to clean and run low when you wanna flow.

Lockout capability to prevent unwanted use.

The Pentair SuperFlo VS is extremely quiet and will easily replace most single-speed pumps rated up to 2HP. When it comes to energy savings, this is the pump you want to purchase.

ALL SHIPPING IN THE USA IS FREE - Some restrictions apply

· Most Orders Ship Free "Standard" To USA Domestic Mailing Addresses.

· We proudly ship with FedEx, USPS, UPS, and OnTrac. ***

· Certain items may be upgraded for shipping…ON US!

· Orders above $300 could be required to have signature confirmation

· All Pool Pumps and Pool Vacuums WILL require a signature upon delivery

· Some Expedited Shipping will incur additional handling time if Pre-Order status is displayed ****

***Shipping Carrier is determined upon delivery speed needed for each order. Paid Expedited Shipping will be shipped at the speed requested but Carriers are subject to change without notice.

**** Handling time varies with inventory and availability. Please reach out with any questions or concerns regarding the inventory of your item.

PLEASE NOTE:

USPS First Class Mail and Priority Mail shipping is NOT GUARANTEED. Displayed transit times are estimates and not Guarantees.

Expedited Shipping via FedEx/UPS: Monday-Friday before 1:00 PM Arizona Time

We do NOT allow changes in address with Carriers after items are shipped.

SATURDAY DELIVERY

Weekend deliveries are the future, and we are striving to meet all the needs of our customers. However, the carriers are attempting on rolling the processes on certain zip codes throughout the mainland 48 states only. Restrictions do apply.

Standard and expedited shipping methods through all carriers cannot guarantee Saturday deliveries due to restrictions to certain carrier zoning.
